plant_analysis_desc: Take or upload a clear photo of the plant. AI will provide disease status and recommendations.

select_province_desc: Select the province where the plant is located
enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address

tip_clear_photo: Use photos that clearly show your plant's leaves and stem
tip_good_lighting: Take photos in daylight or under good lighting
tip_focus_disease: If there are disease symptoms, focus on these areas
no_analysis_desc: Tap on the New Analysis card to create your first plant analysis

accept_terms: I accept the terms of use and privacy policy

header_message_1_subtitle: Instantly learn about your plants' condition with AI-powered advanced analysis technology.
header_message_2_subtitle: Get professional advice and grow your plants in the best way.
header_message_3_subtitle: Detect plant diseases in time with advanced AI technology.
header_message_4_subtitle: Create long-term care strategies and protect your plants.
header_message_5_subtitle: Every analysis makes you a more experienced gardener.
header_message_6_subtitle: Professional analysis tools are now in your pocket.
header_message_7_subtitle: Build a stronger bond with your plants and understand them.

onboarding_desc_1: Analyze your plants' health with AI and detect problems in early stages.
onboarding_desc_2: Get personalized agricultural recommendations based on plant type and growing conditions.
onboarding_desc_3: Diagnose diseases in your plants with AI and get solution recommendations.
onboarding_desc_4: Your AI-powered app for plant health analysis is ready. Start now and analyze your plants' health at a professional level.
app_initialization_error: An Error Occurred While Starting the Application
watering_tip_desc: Water your plants in the morning so they can dry during the night
lighting_tip_desc: Each plant has different light requirements, position them correctly
soil_tip_desc: Regularly check soil pH value and nutrients
pruning_tip_desc: Regularly remove dead leaves and branches
nutrition_tip_desc: Support with appropriate fertilizer during growing periods
disease_prevention_tip_desc: Early detection of disease symptoms makes treatment easier
general_care_tip_desc: Plants require patience, do not expose them to sudden changes
first_analysis_desc: Instantly learn about your plants' health status with AI-powered advanced analysis technology, detect diseases and receive expert recommendations.
add_clear_photo_instruction: Add a clear photo of your plant for accurate analysis

auth_required_for_analysis: You need to sign in to perform analysis
